summary: We testified about how the Department of Veterans Affairs helps ensure veterans get timely access to health care providers in their communities. The Veterans Community Care Program expanded the availability of non-VA care for veterans in 2018. About 2.8 million veterans got community care in 2023. We've made many recommendations to improve appointment scheduling and wait times, and VA's community care program oversight. VA has...
title: Veterans Health Care: Opportunities to Improve Access to Care Through the Veterans Community Care Program
